itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying dinosaur, lizard, or worm hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Dinosaur Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted dinosaur corpse.

item.name: Lizard Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted wolf corpse.

item.name: Worm Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted worm corpse.

item.name: Hard Hide
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying dinosaur, lizard, or worm hide.

item.name: Shining Steel Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Shining Steel Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Shoes with maximum potential.
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas shoes, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Shoes

item.name: Combat Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Durable heavy stirrup made of hard leather that is purpose built for battle.
Makes you able to attack while riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Combat Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Durable heavy saddle made of hard leather that is purpose built for battle.
Increases stability for faster riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Combat Steel Barding
item.desc: Specially made steel horse helmet that can be used in battle. It is very heavy.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Gloves
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Gloves with maximum potential
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas gloves, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Gloves

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Armor
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Armor with maximum potential.
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas armor, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Armor

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Helmet
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Helmet with maximum potential.
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas helmet, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Helmet

item.name: Steel Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall
item.desc:
Energy of iron wall is contained within this Steel Taritas Helmet
Lighter than ordinary Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Helmet of Iron wall, Steel Taritas Helmet, Taritas Helmet

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc: Steel Taritas Shoes made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Shoes.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Steel Taritas Gloves
item.desc: Steel Taritas Gloves made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Gloves.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Supreme Hard Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Shaking Fine Hard Hide and Leather Glaze, an ingredient made through Alchemy. It requires the knowledge of Shaking: Skilled.

※ Shaking: Skilled can be obtained as a challenge reward after achieving Processing Artisan Level 1.

item.name: Lucky Shining Steel Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals. It increases Luck when Gathering.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Lucky Shining Steel Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals. It increases Luck when Gathering.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired
